articles.title: Watch the cast of ‘Ferris Bueller’s Day Off’ reunite for Josh Gad’s ‘Reunited Apart’ - NME

articles.author: Eric Levenson, CNN
articles.title: The Rolling Stones tell Trump campaign to stop playing their songs at rallies - CNN
articles.description: The Rolling Stones are threatening legal action against President Donald Trump's campaign for using their music at his campaign rallies.
